\begin{equation}\label{1.14}

e^{-i\bf{py}}\psi_d(x,y)~,
\

\begin{equation}\label{1.21}

{1 \over G(p)}=\int_{p^2}^\infty {d{\tilde p}^2 \over G_2({\tilde p})}~,
